data.description: Read and write buffering for sockets
data.similar: None for Event, there are probably some for POE
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a layer over Event's basic file event handling
    that invokes a callback when a record (defined by a record separator
    (a regular expression)) is received; it also buffers writes and
    handles close events.
